Constructor Detail

generalItem

public generalItem(java.lang.String newName,
                   java.lang.String newDesc,
                   java.lang.String newArticle)
Create a new Item from a full set of assignments. The item will take on the attributes passed as arguments.

Parameters:
newName - The item name.
newDesc - The item description.

generalItem

public generalItem()
Default Constructor. Used by Player. The name "nothing" signifies a non-existant item.
